name: No Name 2
description:
(FanMade) Game developed in 12 days using Unity.

This game was made not to have a full title, but to learn how to make a good character controller, so there will be no updates or bug fixes, but I still appreciate feedback on issues or improvements.

Initially the game features a large arena with an "infinite" spawn of enemies, but for problems with using multiple enemies I had to squeeze a little and insert only one enemy with an automatic respawn function after (x) time, same thing for the player, once dead, after 10 seconds he is reborn.

There is only one Mission in the game, collect 10 swords to be able to craft and equip 2B's YoRHa sword.

Main Character (2B) and Secondary Character (Pod 042), as well as the YoRHa sword are designs from the famous Nier Automata title.

The game includes 3 languages: Italian, English and Japanese, I wanted to try to create a multilingual system, I apologize in advance if the typing is not perfect.

Environment: AZURE NATURE

----------
